statements.select: SELECT B.IP_ADDR, B.PORT_NO, B.SID_NM, B.CONN_ID, B.CONN_PWD FROM BASE_SITE_INFO A ,BASE_CONN_INFO B WHERE A.SITE_CD = #SITE_CD# AND B.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND B.SITE_CD = A.SITE_CD

SELECT US.USER_ID, US.USER_PWD ,DECODE(( SELECT SYS_CD FROM SYS_USER_MAP UM WHERE US.USER_ID = UM.USER_ID AND US.DEPT_CD = UM.DEPT_CD AND UM.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# ), NULL, 0 , 1) SYS_CD FROM BASE_SITE_INFO BS ,SITE_DEPT_INFO DE ,SYS_USER_INFO US WHERE BS.SITE_CD = DE.SITE_CD AND DE.DEPT_CD = US.DEPT_CD AND US.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND BS.SITE_CD = #SITE_CD#

SELECT USER_ID ,SYS_CD ,MNU_CD ,MNU_NM ,MNU_DESC ,MNU_PATH ,MNU_IMG ,UPPER_CD ,MNU_STEP ,ORD ,DECODE(MIN(MNU_AUTH_ORD), '1', 'N', '2', 'W', '3', 'R') MNU_AUTH FROM ( SELECT USER_MAP.USER_ID ,GRP_MAP.SYS_CD ,GRP_MAP.MNU_CD ,GRP_MAP.MNU_NM ,GRP_MAP.MNU_DESC ,GRP_MAP.MNU_PATH ,GRP_MAP.MNU_IMG ,GRP_MAP.UPPER_CD ,GRP_MAP.MNU_STEP ,GRP_MAP.ORD ,GRP_MAP.GRP_ID ,GRP_MAP.MNU_AUTH ,DECODE(GRP_MAP.MNU_AUTH, 'N', 1, 'W', 2, 'R', 3) MNU_AUTH_ORD FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID, B.SYS_CD, GRP_ID FROM SYS_USER_INFO A ,SYS_USER_MAP B ,SYS_GRP_USER_MAP C WHERE A.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND C.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND C.SYS_CD = B.SYS_CD ) USER_MAP ,( SELECT A.SYS_CD, A.MNU_CD, A.MNU_NM, A.MNU_DESC, A.MNU_PATH, A.MNU_IMG, A.UPPER_CD, A.MNU_STEP, A.ORD, B.GRP_ID, B.MNU_AUTH FROM SYS_MNU_INFO A ,SYS_MNU_GRP_MAP B ,SYS_GRP_INFO C WHERE A.SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.SYS_CD = A.SYS_CD AND B.MNU_CD = A.MNU_CD AND C.GRP_ID = B.GRP_ID AND C.SYS_CD = A.SYS_CD ) GRP_MAP WHERE GRP_MAP.SYS_CD = USER_MAP.SYS_CD AND GRP_MAP.GRP_ID = USER_MAP.GRP_ID ) GROUP BY USER_ID, SYS_CD, MNU_CD, MNU_NM, MNU_DESC,MNU_PATH, MNU_IMG, UPPER_CD, MNU_STEP, ORD
